channel.title: Path and Class path problems
channel.description: Hello, i have set up my class path variable and it works just fine. However, this is not the case with the Path variable. I erase whats in the path variable and put in: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin; then i go to command prompt and type in 'javac' and it works, but when i type in 'ipconfig' it doesnt work. So then i set it back to normal and 'javac' doesnt work but 'ipconfig' does. HELP[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 09, 2008, 10:15:13 PM[/size][hr]Help please?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2008, 12:14:51 AM[/size][hr]someone please help me!!!!!

item.title: Path and Class path problems
item.dc:creator: @Monoxide Monoxide
item.description:
@Monoxide wrote:

Hello, i have set up my class path variable and it works just fine. However, this is not the case with the Path variable. I erase whats in the path variable and put in: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin; then i go to command prompt and type in ‘javac’ and it works, but when i type in ‘ipconfig’ it doesnt work. So then i set it back to normal and ‘javac’ doesnt work but ‘ipconfig’ does. HELP[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 09, 2008, 10:15:13 PM[/size][hr]Help please?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2008, 12:14:51 AM[/size][hr]someone please help me!!!

Read full topic
